item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. OpenAI o1 system card (119 points | 59 comments)

4. 7 Databases in 7 Weeks for 2025 (121 points | 28 comments)

8. Keye (YC F24) Is Hiring – Senior Software Engineer ( | hide)

10. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (45 points | 30 comments)

13. Why Overplanning Makes Projects Fail? (3 points | 1 comment)
14. Diátaxis – A systematic approach to technical documentation authoring (408 points | 103 comments)
15. Boeing Plea Deal over Fatal 737 MAX Crashes Rejected by Judge (44 points | 20 comments)

20. Federal Court Says Dismantling a Phone to Install Firmware Isn't a 'Search' (176 points | 83 comments)

24. Next stop: Miami (185 points | 212 comments)
